content: 5 sl1p k11 wrap and turn row 6 k12 row 7 sl1p k7 wrap and turn row 8 k8 row 9 sl1p k3 wrap and turn row 10 k4 row 11 sl1p k25 there will be 6 stitches on the left needle k2tog yo twice ssk k2 row 12 sl1p k2 k1 p1 into the double yarn over k27 row 13-18 slip1 k31 row 19 rs sl1p k19 wrap and turn row 20 ws k20 row 21 sl1p k15 wrap and turn row 22 k16 row 23 sl1p k11 wrap and turn row 24 k12 row 25 sl1p k7 wrap and turn row 26 k8 row 27 sl1p k3 wrap and turn row 28 k4 row 29 34 sl1p k31 row 35 sl1p k25 there will be 6 stitches on the left needle k2tog yo twice ssk k2 row 36 sl1p k2 k1 p1 into the double yarn over k27 knit 3 row sl1p k31 bind off i suggest using the sewn bind-off to match the long tail cast on weave in ends and attach buttons please check out my other patterns on ravelry scottish princess cmac8120
